detail.content: NYU Stern Records&Registration | Course Syllabi                            Course Syllabi              Please note: Sample syllabi are posted to provide you with    additional information for the course registration process and    may not reflect the final versions of the courses. Content, schedule,    requirements, assignments, etc. may change.
